attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please Gordon Brown get the troops out.  Younger soilders have young families at home to look after they need both parents.  You cannot just pay tribute to  soliders deaths as a "terrible loss" If the troops are still in Afghanistan fighting are you going to leave them there until there are NO SOLIDERS left. Strictly speaking  all soldiers should be taken out now not later.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
